The Protectobots:





Hot Spot watched Prowl get in the way so he cut the water to his hose-cannon, 
transforming into his blue biped form.  He held his flame cannon, taking aim 
and waiting for the first opportunity to light Megatron up.

Groove's focus came in a little better as he charged Rumble, slamming a foot 
downward towards the Decepticon's chest.

Blades pulled up quickly, two bolts digging into the underbelly of his apache 
mode, nothing to vital damage.  "You'll have to do better than that!" he 
taunted, firing off a missile towards Soundwave from one of his rocket tubes.

Streetwise took a few steps back as Spasstik approached him, firing off two 
photon blasts from his pistol at Spasstik's chest.

First Aid winced as he saw Blades get hit, but didn't move to help him.
